scripts.deploy: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote && wrangler deploy

ACCESS_PASSPHRASE.description: Passphrase required on /authorize to approve OAuth access.

OAUTH_KV.description: Stores OAuth clients/codes/tokens and auth guard state.

DB.description: Primary database for knowledge entries, triples, and transactions.

OWNER_EMAIL.description: Required owner email from Cloudflare Access (single-user lock).

CF_ACCESS_TEAM_DOMAIN.description: Cloudflare Access team domain (e.g. 'myteam' for myteam.cloudflareaccess.com). Enables JWT verification.

CF_ACCESS_AUD.description: Cloudflare Access application audience tag. Required with CF_ACCESS_TEAM_DOMAIN.

AI.description: Workers AI binding for generating text embeddings (bge-base-en-v1.5).

VECTORIZE_INDEX.description: Vectorize index for semantic similarity search over knowledge entries.
